modName: Ezio Auditore from Assassins Creed Revelations
summary: I make Ezio Auditore from Assassins Creed Revelations
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110611193906/assassinscreed/de/images/thumb/7/72/ACR_Ezio_Auditore.png/195px-ACR_Ezio_Auditore.png[/img]                          
                            [heading][color=red]DESCRIPTION[/color][/heading]

[b]I make Ezio Auditore from Assassins Creed Revelations and a Request from my friend (flarien)
Is Level 1 From Riverwood. I followed Ralof (Sorry for this if you whant to go with the side of Imperials),
he is a Breton (Because only with Breton can i make Ezio look a like character).[/b]

[heading][color=white]Requirements:[/color][/heading]                                                   
[b]1) You will need this for better faces: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
if you have any body mod simply deactivate the body mod install XCE (the link up) and then install over 
the XCE the body mod that you have it will replace the body back to the way you whant, but
the face textures will be perfect.[/b]

Credits:
mabros

Hope you Enjoy this Saved Game!
Comment and Endorse if you like!
author: mabros
